summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of the alley in Block 8, David S. Maynard's Plat of the Town (now City) of Seattle, being the alley from Yesler Way to Washington Street, between Occidental Avenue and First Avenue South, by filling and planking the same, in accordance with Resolution No. 955 of the City Council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Immediate Payment'" as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
